short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pause and decide mindfully how long you want to spend on distracting sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Intentional browsing made easy.

FocusMode makes you think before you ended up mindlessly scrolling when browsing the web. 

Only access distracting websites with an informed decision, no more wasting time without you realised.

Features:
✅ Blocked (by link and keyword) and allowed list.
✅ Customized text and duration of animation when intervention happens.
✅ Schedule the on/off based on days and time.
✅ Strict session for a certain period.

✅ PRO exclusive:3 randomized animated interventions
✅ PRO exclusive: Real time browsing analytics.

Browsing analytics are stored locally in your browser, we do not store your browsing data in our server. We take privacy very seriously.
